players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was investigated & found to be the mafioso. Be cautious, he knows I'm the detective."
Charlie: "I'm cautious, Diana found me out. Vote wisely."
You: "Diana identified Charlie as the mafioso. Vote him off, town!"
You: "I believe Diana's investigation. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Stay vigilant, Charlie was investigated. Vote wisely."
Diana: "Charlie was investigated. Consider voting him if you suspect mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.

You killed Bob.

Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was investigated & found to be the mafioso. Be cautious, he knows I'm the detective."
You: "I'm cautious, Diana found me out. Vote wisely."
Alice: "Diana identified Charlie as the mafioso. Vote him off, town!"
Alice: "I believe Diana's investigation. Vote Charlie."
You: "Stay vigilant, Charlie was investigated. Vote wisely."
Diana: "Charlie was investigated. Consider voting him if you suspect mafia."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.

Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "I'm cautious, Diana found me out. Vote wisely."
Alice: "Diana identified Charlie as the mafioso. Vote him off, town!"
Alice: "I believe Diana's investigation. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Stay vigilant, Charlie was investigated. Vote wisely."
